comment: Lots and lots of reading but it was very interesting! Grades were based on 5 discussion posts, 3 essays, and one final essay. Wasn't too hard, just make sure you follow the instructions and give a good amount of effort and engage with the texts.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Graded by few things

comment: Very very easy class. She was super kind and gave thoughtful feedback to all of our papers. Would def recommend taking her class for easy credits.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Gives good feedback--Caring

comment: This class is an easy A. I finished this class 14 days early. Do the work and you'll be fine.
